secret_rule: Only items that are anagrams of a plant or animal species can be brought to the picnic.

conversation.content: To start, here are some examples of items you can bring: "straw" and "wasp".
I'll make a new guess to see if it fits the rule. Can I bring "crow"?
I'll make a new guess. Can I bring "spider"?

Based on the examples provided and the guesses, the rule seems to involve whether the item is a type of insect or arthropod. 

The examples given were "straw" (which is a plant material) and "wasp" (which is an insect). When the player guessed "crow" (a bird), it was rejected. When they guessed "spider" (which is an arachnid, not technically an insect but still an arthropod), it was accepted. 

Therefore, my best guess for the secret rule is that you can bring items that are either insects or arthropods but cannot bring birds or other unrelated items.
